official_title: Feasibility and Acceptability of a Community-based Weight Loss Program Among African American Breast Cancer Survivors
inclusion_criteria:
* Women diagnosed with breast cancer with BMI â‰¥ 25 kg/m after completion of primary 2 therapy (surgery, radiation, adjuvant or neo-adjuvant chemotherapy).
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 55 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Women whose oncology providers do not agree with their participation in a weight loss program or those participating in another weight loss program.
